question: Siang-siang ê 'stock repurchase program' kap 'issued on conversions of debentures' chit-ê gia̍p-bū, choân-pō͘ nî-tō͘ ê 'shares outstanding' ê net-tē kái-piàn sī siáⁿ-chōa?
Tī 2008, 2009, hām 2010 nî tiong, koh chi̍t nî ê téng-muîⁿ chiáh ū siōng sió ê sòaⁿ-bâi piàn-tōaⁿ ê 'shares outstanding'?
Chiu chhut ê 'shares outstanding' siōng-tōa ê to̍k-li̍p cheng-ka sī sím-mih sū-bū? Tarng chiahCalculate chhut i ê 'in treasury' shares hām i ê 'shares outstanding' ê pí-tōo.
answer: Sū-bū sī 'acquisition of smith international inc.'. Pí-tōo sī aşağı-ma-tōa 0.432 (76 / 176).

question: Tui 2008 nî chho͘ kàu 2010 nî bo̍at, 'tī chhoan-chè lāi-bīn' ê kó͘-phiò chûn-chāi ê cheng-tâi it-puàⁿ ū hō-chóaⁿ chhián-chhiat?
answer: ‘Tī chhoan-chè lāi-bīn’ ê kó͘-phiò sò͘-liōng, sī kám-chiap chin-tâi--ê, chi̍t-pái sī kiám--khì chi̍t-pái sī cheng--khì, chi̍t-pái sī kiám--khì (kiám sió chi̍t-ê sió sûn-bī ê hū-sò͘). I sī khai-sí tī -138, tī 2008 nî kiám sió chi̍t-ē chiâⁿ -140, tī 2009 nî chhú-koh sió-sió chiâⁿ -139, liáu-āu tī 2010 nî bo̍at chin tōa tōa kiám chiâⁿ -73, che chin tōa pō͘-hūn sī in-ūi kap Smith International Inc. kau-e̍k só͘ sán-seng ê kó͘-phiò.

question: Liét chhut 2008 nî (1 goe̍h 1 ji̍t kap 12 goe̍h 31 ji̍t chha-bõe ê kî-kan) ū chòe siáⁿ-choán sū-kiāⁿ, chiah ē-sái hō͘ 'chhut-lâi ê kó͘' (shares outstanding) ê sò͘-liōng chòe kiâⁿ-chhin ê éng-hióng?
answer: shares sold to optionees less shares exchanged
shares issued under employee stock purchase plan

question: Tī 2010 nî 12 goe̍h 31 hō ê chòe-āu ê 'chhiuⁿ-chhù chûn-chāi' chha-piau lāi-bīn, ū hō͘ 'kò͘-bái Smith International Inc.' ê tùi-chòe tì-sìⁿ liap--ji̍t ê chha-piau sī chòe-chē chha-piah?
Nā-sī 2010-nî ê 'sio̍k-chè Smith International Inc.' bô hoat-seng, nā-sī kî-tha kòan-sòan lóng bô-piàn, chiah teh 2010-nî 12-goe̍h 31 hō ê 'tu̍t-chú só͘-iú-koân' ê nî-té kiat-sûn ē-sī siáⁿ-chē?
In the years presented, is there a clear connection between the number of shares issued to optionees and the number issued under the employee stock purchase plan? Please explain.
answer: Bē ū chiok chheng-chhiong ê koan-hē bē. 2008 nî, bē chē chi̍t kó͘ sió-tiâⁿ hō͘ khoán-chè-chiá ê kó͘ (5) pí chū chit-gia̍p-chiá kó͘-chiàⁿ chi̍t ê sió-tiâⁿ (2). 2009 nî, nn̄g ê sò͘-jī sī kāng-khoán (4 kap 4). 2010 nî, bē chē chi̍t kó͘ sió-tiâⁿ hō͘ khoán-chè-chiá ê kó͘ (6) pí chū chit-gia̍p-chiá kó͘-chiàⁿ chi̍t ê sió-tiâⁿ (3). Chit nn̄g ê sò͘-jī ê pí-lē tiāu-chiàu chi̍t ê nî chi̍t ê nî bē-sâng, chin chē tō bô chin chheng-chhiong ê koan-hē.

question: Tī 'issued', 'in treasury', 'shares outstanding' chit 3 lūi ê bīn-chêng ê dâi-khóan lāi-bīn, bô-lūn sek-lāi chiong-chē (exclude balance rows), hō͘-sò͘ hō͘-sò͘ bô-sio̍k-chèng ia̍h-sī bô-tiāⁿ-khó-khó ê dâi-khóan ê hō͘-sò͘ lâi-kóng, hō͘-sò͘ chiàⁿ-báⁿ ê lūi sī na̍h chi̍t lūi?
answer: Chit ê 'issued' bīn-chêng ê dâi-khóan sī siōng-báⁿ bô-tiāⁿ-khó. Nā-sī kî-thaⁿ ê bīn-chêng lūi sī ū hō͘-sò͘ (ia̍h-sī chiàⁿ-báⁿ ê chiàⁿ-báⁿ ê hō͘-sò͘-sè), chit ê 'issued' bīn-chêng lūi sī ū chi̍t-ê lūi-hêng ê sò͘-chāi ('1334', '1434', '100') hām chi̍t-ê tiāⁿ-tiāⁿ chhâi chhut-lâi ê sò͘-chāi '2013', chit ê 2013 bô-chāi tùi i chēⁿ thàu ê chhiúⁿ-tha̍h lāi bô kò͘-sî-ē tòng-chiáⁿ ê sò͘-chāi.

question: Tī 'shares outstanding' ê chha-iáⁿ tiong, hō͘ i siōng tiâⁿ chē ê tùi-hō͘ chò-hòe ê pâi-lia̍t, sím-mih tan-it ê kau-e̍k hō͘ i chha-iáⁿ siōng tiâⁿ chē ê tùi-hō͘ chiâⁿ-chòe chi̍t ê chha-iáⁿ-kè siāng tōa ê hō͘-chhut?
Chi̍p iûⁿ ê iâⁿ-chú hām chhut-miâⁿ ê kó͘-chōi tī chha-khò-kiùⁿ ê chhiú-bīn lē-iōng sī chí-bóan cheng-kim?
